name: surrealistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not seem real, or that seems very unusual or impossible: The tiny oil painting "Persistence of Memory" shows melting golden clocks surrealistically draped across a dreamlike landscape. His stories involve characters who are almost surrealistically strange.
More examplesFewer examplesIf you like your crime fiction fast-moving and almost surrealistically funny, this is a book for you.A portrait of a man with a square-cut white beard painted in enamel is almost surrealistically vivid.One of the artist's greatest images is the surrealistically lit "Moonrise, Hernandez, New Mexico".
